results.title: Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd - IFA Berlin 2023
results.content: Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 in Suzhou which have 20-year experience on manufacturing and inventing TV bracket, desktop and wall mounts, projector mounts, carts & work stations, etc. and now we're engaged in developing and manufacturing modern office furniture product line and waterproof cases.
results.raw_content:
​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​
Exhibitors
Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd
Suzhou Handy Audio-Visual Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 in Suzhou which have 20-year experience on manufacturing and inventing TV bracket, desktop and wall mounts, projector mounts, carts & work stations, etc. and now we're engaged in developing and manufacturing modern office furniture product line and waterproof cases.
Our products are sold far to Europe, North America, Asia and other regions. As a manufacturer, our quality is High-end and prices are competitive. As an inventor, we're keeping expanding our product line and inventing Pneumatic system and motor adjustable modern office furniture which accommodating the trend of standing office. As a trader that active in the field for 20-year, we are knowledgeable on world trading and you can get the professional and efficient service during our corporation.

Ultra-low Standby Power Microprocessors for 5G IoT Gateway Devices

Explore
New Products
Renesas’ RAA211230/320 are high performance, pin-compatible buck regulators integrated with constant-on-time control enabling fast transient response in a compact package. These bucks are engineered to enhance and accelerate your next power supply design while reducing overall BOM cost.
New RA2E3 48 MHz Arm® Cortex®-M23 entry-line MCUs deliver the lowest power consumption and optimized features for IoT applications and battery-operated systems.
Reduce system size and component count of high-speed and high-precision sensor system with RX23E-B MCU embedded with a maximum speed of 125kSPS ΔΣA/D converter and enhanced analog front end (AFE) performance.

Events & Webinars
Join us for an exciting Tech Day full of technology deep-dives, hands-on learning, multiple live demonstrations, and expert discussions. You will get practical insights on Renesas’ latest products and solutions to make your lives easier in the following areas:
• MCU Real Time Analytics – Reality AI
• MPU Embedded Vision using Artificial Intelligence
• System Solutions with Wireless Connectivity
• AI Enablement through third party partners

insight on Renesas’ vision and strategy for AI
